entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in DQC Rules Validator successful, version Check version using Tools->DQC->Version on the GUI or --dqc-version on the command line. - validate/DQC
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 1.0.0.178. - transforms/SEC

[DQC.US.0081.9277] The line item concept us-gaap:PaymentsForProceedsFromOtherDeposits with a value of 7,000 is represented as a child of us-gaap:NetCashProvidedByUsedInInvestingActivities with a value of 3,229,125 in the companies extension taxonomy role 1006 - Statement - Consolidated Statements of Cash Flows. The element us-gaap:PaymentsForProceedsFromOtherDeposits however, is not represented as a component of us-gaap:NetCashProvidedByUsedInInvestingActivities in the US-GAAP taxonomies. The US-GAAP taxonomies include us-gaap:PaymentsForProceedsFromOtherDeposits as a sibling element (or child of that sibling) relative to us-gaap:NetCashProvidedByUsedInInvestingActivities. Please review the element selection to determine that an appropriate element has been used for the parent element us-gaap:NetCashProvidedByUsedInInvestingActivities and the child element us-gaap:PaymentsForProceedsFromOtherDeposits.
The properties of this us-gaap:PaymentsForProceedsFromOtherDeposits fact are:
Period :2016-01-01 to 2016-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : USD
Rule Element Id:9277 Rule version: 9.0.0RC1 - https://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/1535955/000114420419012434/lpcn-20181231.xml 1915

The element us-gaap:PaymentsForProceedsFromOtherDeposits however, is not represented as a component of us-gaap:NetCashProvidedByUsedInInvestingActivities in the US-GAAP taxonomies. The US-GAAP taxonomies include us-gaap:PaymentsForProceedsFromOtherDeposits as a sibling element (or child of that sibling) relative to us-gaap:NetCashProvidedByUsedInInvestingActivities. Please review the element selection to determine that an appropriate element has been used for the parent element us-gaap:NetCashProvidedByUsedInInvestingActivities and the child element us-gaap:PaymentsForProceedsFromOtherDeposits.
The properties of this us-gaap:PaymentsForProceedsFromOtherDeposits fact are:
